hi

oh my God oh my God I'm dead
oh no I'm Dreaming I must be dreaming
okay
um now those guys in the black pajamas
they jumped me and and that rat I saw
you in the parking lot that explains you
and you guys
um
[Music]
I have no idea where you came from if
you will please just sit down and calm
yourself I will tell you where we came
from
it is really quite simple Miss O'Neil
who's my name
perfect
15 years ago why don't I ever dream of
Harrison Ford
for 15 years now we have lived here
before that time I was a pet of my
master Yoshi
mimicking his movements from my cage and
learning the secret art of ninja
when we were forced to come to New York
I found myself for the first time
without a home laundering the sewers
Scavenging for whatever I could find and
then one day I Came Upon a shattered
glass job and four baby turtles that was
us shut up oh no
the little ones were crawling into a
strange glowing Ooze from a broken
canister nearby
I gathered them up in an old coffee can
and when I awoke the next morning I
received a shock for they had doubled in
size
I too was growing particularly in
intellect and I was amazed at how
intelligent they seemed but nothing
could have prepared me for what happened
next one of them spoke
Pizza Pizza all words followed and I
began their training teaching them all
that I had learned from life
and soon I gave them all names Leonardo
Michelangelo it's me Donatello and
Raphael
I'm not dreaming am I no I'm afraid not
